description.translate: A memory does not protect,	a weapon can.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Dague du père\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Un souvenir ne protège pas,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7une arme le peut.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A memory does not protect,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a weapon can.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a1 §7DAR§a3 §7HER§c-2\"}"]}}
